title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; pip install ollama to chat, pull, push and manage models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM & embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact to chat & embed from JVM apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL to run and chat with local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with interactive chat, prompt templates, and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as Generators or Embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images and docker-compose stacks for CPU & GPU inference.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling support.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All-chat UI fork that can also connect to local Ollama instances.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate for Ollama REST API.
